title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 10 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Apr 10 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


It's Rally Day! EIB models project audience of 40 million. Fed Chair declares obvious: Economy deteriorating rapidly. We will come out of this. Trump is right about America coming back. Conservatives are trained to believe the people they elect will betray them, but Trump is different, knows what has to be done. Fauci, Birx, doomsayers can't be wrong, can't lose, have no weight on their shoulders. Trump, Kudlow, Meadows focused on reopening economy. Trump knows people will continue to die from COVID-19 and he knows he will be blamed. The President calls Rush every week to ask how he's feeling, doesn't talk politics. Trump is not one of the elites, he is one of us. Trump holds Easter blessing in Oval Office. EIB audience model upped to 42 million. Unusual, deadly flu outbreak killed 16 people in January in California. Was it coronavirus? Chicago antibody testing center finds 30% recovered patients. We're waiting for permission from experts who were wrong to reopen the country. Alex Berenson. Seattle field hospital dismantled because it's not needed; last week, Gov. Inslee slammed federal gov't for not doing enough.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Trump says he's getting pressure from Wall Street friends to open economy, setting the stage for reopening. Fauci says the virus is the boss. The virus is not the boss, Trump is the boss. Former New York Times reporter Alex Berenson battles mainstream media virus narratives. What golf clubs does Rush use and what's the lowest round he ever shot? Social distancing narrative. NYC construction worker thinks he and his co-workers had coronavirus in December. Caller reenacts Betsy Ross. Rush JIPs Trump virus briefing.



PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Rush JIPs the White House coronavirus briefing. Environmentalists praise virus for saving the planet. Pope Francis thinks virus is nature's response to climate change. Trump has been talking about the danger posed by the Chinese since the ‘80s and ‘90s. DeSantis says Florida schools may reopen soon. Fox News poll shows Trump approval at all-time high, Trump-Biden tied, 9-point Biden lead erased. This crisis has taught people we're dependent on China for so many things. It's not time to panic, because Trump knows what must be done.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
